solution_line_template: {time_minutes} minutes for {distance_miles} miles means {time_minutes} minutes / {distance_miles} miles = <<{time_minutes}/{distance_miles}={minutes_per_mile}>>{minutes_per_mile} minutes/mile
1 hour is {minutes_per_hour} minutes so {minutes_per_hour} minutes/hour / {minutes_per_mile} minutes/mile = {speed_mph} miles/hour
